name: Damage Control Trading
description: Strategy for managing trades when bias breaks or structure shifts, often involving hedge logic.

name: Hedge-Only Zone
description: Price areas where only hedge trades are allowed, not new bias entries.

name: Bias and Structure Relationship
description: Establishing directional bias only after structure confirms or breaks.

name: Phased Trade Development
description: Trades develop in phases — early, transition, mature. Strategy adapts accordingly.

name: Drawdown-Controlled Trading
description: Trade management adapts to account drawdown limits using concepts like DCT and hedging.
